title: Relationship sex: Why many women still feel pressure to say yes
subhead: Many women have sex with their partners even when they do not want to, out of reluctance to say no, uncertainty about desire, or fear of offending. Together, these reasons sketch the contours of a gray zone of consent.

title: Trump makes U-turn on Ukraine and lectures Europeans at the UN
subhead: The US president made a dramatic reversal on his own position regarding the war in Ukraine on Tuesday, declaring that Kyiv 'is in a position to fight and win all of Ukraine back in its original form.' Speaking at the United Nations, he criticized European countries' migration and energy policies.
